changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION addTenant() RETURNS TRIGGER LANGUAGE PLPGSQL AS $$ BEGIN INSERT INTO house_history(house_id, person_id, create_date, person_type) VALUES(NEW.resident_house, NEW.id , now(), 'TENANT'); RETURN NEW; END; $$
changeSet.sql: CREATE TRIGGER houseHistoryCreateTenant AFTER INSERT ON person FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION addTenant();
